short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open a new incognito tab with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open Incognito Tab is a simple and convenient extension for Google Chrome that allows users to open new tabs in incognito mode with just one click. If you frequently use incognito mode for browsing the web but find the process of opening a new incognito tab too lengthy, this extension will be an excellent solution.
